51 template <typename T>
52 class ValueOrPointeeLessTest : public ::testing::Test
53 {
54 protected:
55  bool less(int lhs, int rhs) {
56  ValueOrPointeeLess<T> comp;
57  return comp(create<T>(lhs), create<T>(rhs));
58  }
59 };
60 // set of template types to test for
61 typedef ::testing::Types<int, int*, mtc::SolutionBasePtr, mtc::SolutionBaseConstPtr> TypeInstances;
62 TYPED_TEST_CASE(ValueOrPointeeLessTest, TypeInstances);
63 TYPED_TEST(ValueOrPointeeLessTest, less) {
64  EXPECT_TRUE(this->less(2, 3));
65  EXPECT_FALSE(this->less(1, 1));
66  EXPECT_FALSE(this->less(2, 1));
67 }

69 template <typename T>
70 class OrderedTest : public ::testing::Test, public ordered<T>
71 {
72 protected:
73  void pushAndValidate(int cost, const std::vector<int>& expected) {
74  this->insert(create<T>(cost));
75 
76  std::vector<int> actual;
77  std::transform(this->c.begin(), this->c.end(), std::back_inserter(actual),
78  [](const T& item) -> int { return value<T>(item); });
79 
80  EXPECT_THAT(actual, ::testing::ElementsAreArray(expected));
81  }
82  void validatePop() {
83  std::vector<int> expected;
84  std::vector<int> actual;
85  std::transform(this->c.begin(), this->c.end(), std::back_inserter(expected),
86  [](const T& item) -> int { return value<T>(item); });
87 
88  while (!this->empty())
89  actual.push_back(value<T>(this->pop()));
90 
91  EXPECT_THAT(actual, ::testing::ElementsAreArray(expected));
92  EXPECT_TRUE(this->empty());
93  }
94 };
95 
96 #define pushAndValidate(cost, ...) \
97  { \
98  SCOPED_TRACE("pushAndValidate(" #cost ", " #__VA_ARGS__ ")"); \
99  this->pushAndValidate(cost, __VA_ARGS__); \
100  }
101 TYPED_TEST_CASE(OrderedTest, TypeInstances);
102 TYPED_TEST(OrderedTest, sorting) {
103  pushAndValidate(2, { 2 });
104  pushAndValidate(1, { 1, 2 });
105  pushAndValidate(3, { 1, 2, 3 });
106  this->validatePop();
107 
108  pushAndValidate(1, { 1 });
109  pushAndValidate(2, { 1, 2 });
110  pushAndValidate(3, { 1, 2, 3 });
111  pushAndValidate(4, { 1, 2, 3, 4 });
112  pushAndValidate(5, { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 });
113  this->validatePop();
114 
115  pushAndValidate(5, { 5 });
116  pushAndValidate(4, { 4, 5 });
117  pushAndValidate(3, { 3, 4, 5 });
118  pushAndValidate(1, { 1, 3, 4, 5 });
119  pushAndValidate(2, { 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 });
120  this->validatePop();
121 }

123 template <typename ValueType, typename CostType>
124 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const cost_ordered<ValueType, CostType>& queue) {
125  for (const auto& pair : queue.sorted())
126  os << pair.cost() << ": " << pair.value() << std::endl;
127  return os;
128 }

130 template <typename ValueType, typename CostType = int>
131 class CostOrderedTest : public ::testing::Test
132 {
133 protected:
134  using container_type = std::deque<ValueType>;
135  using queue_type = cost_ordered<ValueType, std::deque<ValueType>, CostType>;
136 
137  CostOrderedTest() {}
138 
139  auto insert(ValueType value, CostType cost = CostType()) { return queue.insert(value, cost); }
140 
141  void fill(int first = 1, int last = 5) {
142  for (; first < last; ++first)
143  insert(first, first);
144  }
145 
146  cost_ordered<ValueType, CostType> queue;
147 
148  void SetUp() override {}
149  void TearDown() override {}
150 };
151 using CostOrderedTestInt = CostOrderedTest<int, int>;
152 
153 TEST_F(CostOrderedTestInt, ordered_push) {
154  auto top = *insert(2, 2);
155  for (int i = 3; i < 6; ++i) {
156  insert(i, i);
157  EXPECT_EQ(queue.top(), top);
158  }
159 }
160 
161 TEST_F(CostOrderedTestInt, reverse_ordered_push) {
162  for (int i = 6; i > 3; --i) {
163  insert(i, i);
164  EXPECT_EQ(queue.top().cost(), i);
165  EXPECT_EQ(queue.top().value(), i);
166  }
167 }
168 
169 TEST_F(CostOrderedTestInt, update) {
170  fill(3, 5);
171  auto first = queue.top();
172  auto added = *insert(7, 3);
173  // items with same cost are added behind existing values
174  EXPECT_EQ(queue.top(), first);
175  EXPECT_EQ(*(++queue.begin()), added);
176 }
